page.title: 081ST SHEFFORD BROWNIES
page.content:
Our{Brownie pack}is called 1st
Shefford Brownies.There are 22 Brownies in our pack.We are split into groups called Gnomes,Pixies,Elves and Kelpies. We go to "Brownies" on a Thursday evening from 6 p.m. until 7.15 p.m. at the Church Hall in Shefford.We were a brown dress, a brown purse, a brown bobble hat and a yellow tie.On our tie is our promise badge to show that the wearer is a Brownie. You must be Just over 7 years old to join the Brownies and you have to leave when you are 10 years old. At "Brownies" we work for our badges but we also play games and make things.We try to do at least one good turn every day.
